title: Enjoy Conditioning Spray - 10 oz [Misc.]
description: Detangles, moisturizes, and protects the hair from blow drying, sun and other thermal services without weighing your hair down. A low PH of 3.5 to 4.5 closes the cuticle, smoothes the hair, locks in color, and makes perms last longer. This product is great for reactivating styling products and deodorizing on dry hair. Great for reactivating curl and maintaining hair color. May be used on the skin as a moisturizing body spray. IMPORTANT INGREDIENTS: PANTHENOL: Vitamin B-5 complex factor which thickens hair and helps maintain the cuticle. STEARYL ALCOHOL: Lubricant that adds moisture and detangles the hair. KERATIN AMINO ACIDS: Repairs the hairs internal structure. DIMETHICONE COPOLYOL: Shine and protects the outer structure or cuticle of the hair.

title: Burt's Bees Intense Hydration Night Cream, 1.8 Ounces
description: How to determine the expiration date:The lot code is six to seven  digits long and starts with a 0, 1, 2 or 3. To read the lot code, the  first three numbers are the day of the year the product was made (aka  Julian Date). The next two digits are the year, and the last two digits  are a batch number we use internally for identification. For example,  lot code 0400901 translates to a product made on February 9, 2009 from  Batch Number 1.
